channel.title: Had a merc throw the game, how do I report?
channel.description:
What happened: Merc threw the game 3 people left, me the king and him he contracts me then vote execute me and his reasoning was he doesn't want BD to win. If theres anyway there is a match history to look I can give a vague memory of his name but he was player 9 i believe.
What was SUPPOSED to happen:
Steps to reproduce this issue:
1. 2. 3.

item.title: Had a merc throw the game, how do I report?
item.dc:creator: í42-Xblade
item.description:
Yup, at the end of the game – includes all logs and more stuff you players don’t see.

I can guarantee you that at least one person reported them and they’ll be dealt with ~

Read full topic
item.source: Had a merc throw the game, how do I report?
